data.name: THE NEW CHRONICLES OF NOAH'S ARK
data.detailed_description:
Help Noah in this Match3 game to build a great ark capable of housing two of each kind of animal, in order to save them and bring them safely through the flood. It will be a tremendous task, one that sounds impossible to complete.

- The classic story of Noah’s ark retold here in a new format!
- Gather resources through challenging match-3 puzzles.
- Build the ark across 20 upgrades and 5 chapters.
- Enjoy this classic story given new life.
- Fascinating graphics and music while playing the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Device
